reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello tPeter.
Thank you so much for the feedback and for rating us. :D 
Please tryout our other watchfaces in the App store. 
If you have any problems or issues while using our app please email us 
(ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) and we will be happy to help you out. 
Thank you and best regards.

author: Jessica Ward
comment: I love this watch face. Would love to see an update that names it "Briar" in my apps instead of "Brial" and more importantly makes the ambient mode hours and minutes brighter. If love to have the Briar hands in ambient mode, but they're almost black and illegible. Otherwise this face is lovely.

author: Rachel Gaines
comment: I love this Watch face. Sure, it drains your battery and yeah, there aren't any hour numbers on the face for the hands to indicate where they're pointing, so the consumer is left guessing at the time but still, its so so cute. I love it.
title: So cute!!

author: Trina B.
comment: Basic watchface that looks great and good battery life.
title: Moto 360 1st gen

author: Yvonne Purton
comment: Beautiful watch face, but the basic ambient mode (option 2) only briefly shows the watch face, then the screen goes completely black. Not that useful for a watch.
